Title: Relates to requests for cancellation of the designation of a polling place
Summary: Relates to requests for cancellation of the designation of a polling place; provides that the board or agency controlling a designated polling place may file a written request for a cancellation of such designation where there has been a security concern in such building and that such building does not possess the proper structure or procedures to keep the public safe in the event of a security concern arising during the use of such building as a polling site.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requests for cancellation of the designation of a polling place
